title: ISic000468. A dedication to the Caesars by L. Caelius Quadratus
body:
Facsimile Images

Caesarib(us)
sacrum
L(ucius) Caelius M(arci) f(ilius)
Quadratus
5d(e) s(ua) p(ecunia)

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL

English translation

Sacred to the Caesars. Lucius Caelius Quadratus, son of Marcus (dedicated this) at his own expense

commentary

The inscription appears to be lost, recorded first in Fazello 1558

bibliography

    Fazello 1558 Dec. 1, book 5, p.23 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002606 10.7191 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589 Schubring 1873 75 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002684 Manganaro 1988 47 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
